None.Name: Tainted Construction
None.Description: Creates a productive aura that reduces the necessary construction time of friendly buildings placed within a 20m radius by 25%. Additionally, every enemy unit within it will be weakened and deal 30% less damage against structures. Lasts for 20 seconds. Reusable every 30 seconds.
